title: urf is disappointing now.
body:
everyone's toxic as hell for not choosing muh meta

when a team gets ahead they stall out the game and base camp people, refusing to end while taunting nonstop

the same op's are always picked {{champion:7}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:105}} 

its not the same because it's not new, and people abuse the fuck out of the op's.

if it was random like aram, i'd probably like it a lot more.

but now its people crying about metas, people spamming ops, and being extremely toxic in what should be a FUN game mode.

replies.body: The same thing happened last year. People just forgot because the "bring back URF" propaganda got to their heads.

> [{quoted}](name=Penguin Eclipse,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=f0UAdEv1,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-04-02T14:36:57.311+0000)
>
> The same thing happened last year. People just forgot because the "bring back URF" propaganda got to their heads.

No, last year alot of the problem picks were disabled and for the others, we had bans
No... it was EXACTLY the same last year lol.

There were like 3 champions banned last year, 2 of which weren't banned until later on. All of the picks listed in the OP were just as OP last year. Out of them only Sona was banned and Sona does a whole lot less damage now so she's not even the same rate of OP she was when she was banned last year.

> [{quoted}](name=Penguin Eclipse,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=f0UAdEv1,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-04-02T14:36:57.311+0000)
>
> The same thing happened last year. People just forgot because the "bring back URF" propaganda got to their heads.

It was fun last year too, just too many people whining the same last year got champs banned from URF, which was garbage can lame.

It is the same mentality as ranked "I can't be bothered to figure out how to counter it, so I'm gonna whine" Same reason Darius got nerfed so hard, because no one bothered thinking against him and just played the same old same old and got stomped.

Most of the "op" champs have counters, just no one wants to bother. They just want to complain is all. 

These same kind of people complain on the boards about how ARAM is somehow unfair even though it is random...is a reason I rarely visit the boards anymore :P
I keep seeing threads about this. I played Urf almost all day yesterday and what the OP suggests NEVER happened, ever. Everyone was picking whatever they felt like picking, and having fun.

> [{quoted}](name=Laraso,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=f0UAdEv1,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2015-04-02T15:31:13.918+0000)
>
> I keep seeing threads about this. I played Urf almost all day yesterday and what the OP suggests NEVER happened, ever. Everyone was picking whatever they felt like picking, and having fun.

I got reported for picking Blitz because the guy felt he was not viable in Urf.

I played 4 games, 3 of them had massive toxicity on at least one team ("kill yourself shitlord") and the 4th had a rage quitter followed by an intentional feeder.

Good old LOL community.It ignores the fun part about the game mode & just look for wins.

Guys if you want wins,go to ranked.URF is about going crazy & having fun.
another good point, fun game mode is meant to be fun, but people lose and say mode is trash

I played two games.
First one, just regular URF.
Second one, the enemy ezreal kept insulting his teammates in all chat, I can't even imagine the nerdrage his poor team had to endure in a game mode, made to be silly and over the top.

It's just sad.

Man, the league community is retarded sometimes. Anything they get beat by they think is op. try new things, be smart, and you can beat all those "op" picks easily. 

I accidentally picked rumble only to realize he is ridiculous now because he cant overheat. I stomped a fizz so hard it wasnt even funny. 

In other words, when you lose, stfu and learn to play.

I played Nautilus against a Blitzcrank bot lane. Had a ton of fun deliberately throwing my anchor at a wall just before he hooked me, so I would be grabbed, but then pull myself to the wall instead. Proceeded to stomp over everything that game, because permashield op.
Sometimes that anchor just weighs you down, you know what I'm saying? :D
^^^^this guy hahahaha

> [{quoted}](name=GaleWinUnleashed,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=f0UAdEv1,comment-id=00100000,timestamp=2015-04-02T16:52:49.584+0000)
>
> I played Nautilus against a Blitzcrank bot lane. Had a ton of fun deliberately throwing my anchor at a wall just before he hooked me, so I would be grabbed, but then pull myself to the wall instead. Proceeded to stomp over everything that game, because permashield op.

Exactly. People that complain are just people that can't counterpick, counterplay or think for themselves. The meta has destroyed their minds.
yeah! those noobs, not counterpicking in BLIND PICK
hahahhahahahhahahahahahahahahah like lee sin

> [{quoted}](name=Gavran,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=f0UAdEv1,comment-id=0010000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-03T06:40:15.426+0000)
>
> yeah! those noobs, not counterpicking in BLIND PICK

"they always spam zed and i get destroyed, gut him!" 

"how am i supposed to counter in blind pick!?"

Which is it? do you know you have to counter all the op champs like zed or is completely random?

The lack of reason is astounding.

Go ahead, give me a champion that counters everyone listed in the OP. And it's not just them, either, and also who the fuck wants to just play a counterpick even if there was one?

The point is the mode gives a large number of champions the ability to win with zero interaction, and that gets boring really fast for everyone who isn't playing those champions.
The perma flamespitter and sheild/move speed are awesome. Rumble is kinda hidden op on urf. Plus a 15 sec cd on equalizer is just silly.
{{champion:36}}

I only played three URF games. Never picked one of your picks. Never got raged at. Won each game.

http://i59.tinypic.com/33v2ssm.png

What's amazing is in the Annie game I soloed 3 barons and 4 dragons. Got the 20 minute baron with no help. AWESOME.
Why do you think you won? Annie passive. But tell me more about how spammy mages with CC are not instant win?

They were making the point that champions outside of this narrow 'meta' are really powerful (and that people aren't necessarily toxic if you pick someone that's not in the 'meta').

The point is that there are a lot of champions that are strong, just many people aren't really willing to experiment beyond a select few.
Let's turn this into an Annie QQ thread. Nice one.
Except Urf has no modicum of balance. Sorry if you took it the wrong way.

Let's just play URF for the fun.  Don't be so serious.  Yes, Sona is ridiculous, Zed is a pain, but try new things.  Don't just pick champs because the are op.  Let's enjoy one thing before we go back to being all serious in ranked.  BTW, Garen is fun to just spin around the rift.
Wow your experience is way different then mine.  I have been seeing them all in urf and no one has said a thing about picking a certain champ.
Me too. I'm baffled anytime someone says every game is toxic OP meta shit. Actually, the amount of toxicity in URF is *way lower than I see in usual normals.*

I've been so far primarly playing Zyra, but I've been picking Sona too.  NOT because of any kind of meta or overpowered interest, but because I have DJ Sona and Kinetic is an AWESOME piece of background music for URF.

I played Teemo. Mushroom minefields everywhere!

Oh, yeah, URF was fun too.
i see satan had a good day.
Welp, Riot gave you URF, get over it and just mute people while playing. In Champ-Select all you can do is ignore people.

So far, I've had success with URF. Some wins, some losses, but for the most part, both captains ban the crazy champs and it usually ends up fun. If you lose for experimenting with different champs, just roll with it, it happens.
I had weird success with Soraka mid against Ryze. Her silence field is OP on a 4s CD and caused me to get camped by the enemy Hecarim.

THEN DONT PLAY IT, the game mode is meant to be fun and play as whataver champ you want. those champs wreck so i ban at least three of them, but you can counter them as well. People also play as them so they are like on crack with this mode. Just have fun and dont get butt hurt
Noone plays Rumble. Rumble is OP like craaaaaazeh now that he's not silenced on overheat. He went from one of the worst URF champs to one of the best.
{{champion:31}}  Shits on a lot of the spammed picks.  {{champion:89}}  is pretty funny too for letting someone else blow them up.

> [{quoted}](name=PapaShongo53,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=f0UAdEv1,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-04-02T14:31:11.484+0000)
>
> {{champion:31}}  Shits on a lot of the spammed picks.  {{champion:89}}  is pretty funny too for letting someone else blow them up.

I've had success with Braum. He's the ultimate macho man 'get the %$#@ off my teammate' support in URF :P. 2 second q cooldown.
{{champion:57}} also best tree, q and w to root all the things forever :D

The enemy team: "SPAM EVERYTHING!"
{{champion:201}} : Block everything.
Also you, and possibly a buddy, get a permanent resistance buff as long as you remember to use it.

> [{quoted}](name=KidSpectre,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=f0UAdEv1,comment-id=000a00000000,timestamp=2015-04-02T19:15:17.350+0000)
>
> The enemy team: "SPAM EVERYTHING!"
> {{champion:201}} : Block everything.
> Also you, and possibly a buddy, get a permanent resistance buff as long as you remember to use it.

Yeah, I was duoing with a friend and we laned together. I spent a good chunk of time annoying him with constant 'Stand behind Braum!' shouts :P
well goddamn, its the same champs that people on the boards QQ about off of urf. Coinicidence? WE THINK NOT!
when was the last time you saw a shacco complaint out side of sucks on my team but OP on enemy WTF threads.

NERF SHACO HE IS TO OP

thanks for reminding me i almost forgot.
glad to help

My option....pick Galio or Yorick. Laugh as Galio's one weakness, mana, is solved and you spam your shield that heals you and  your q, which does tons of damage. Bully everyone out of lane with your sustain. Or go Yorick and spam all the ghouls. I could 2 v 1 Aatrox and Hecarim at one point

Out of those OP picks you mentioned, I have only played Ezreal. I have over two dozen URF games played now, with a different champion every time, and it's a blast.

Play champions you think would be fun, you don't have to conform to this temporary "meta".

talking about OP on urf?

let me show you some different champs:

{{champion:28}}:QQQ
{{champion:1}}:faceroll
{{champion:114}}:faceroll
 {{champion:24}}:build gunblade then all ap and QWEQWE solo nashor
{{champion:3}} : you know
{{champion:126}}:EQQQQQ
 {{champion:11}} : untargeted every AA
{{champion:78}}: build ap, REQEQ
 {{champion:134}}:faceroll
 {{champion:18}}:EQEQEQEQ on their towers
 {{champion:8}}:WWWWW
 {{champion:5}}:build AP,EQWEQWEQW
 {{champion:62}}: build dmg
{{champion:25}} :QEQEQE
{{champion:98}} :build AP

and..
